Articles.Content:
Curious if anyone knows about issues that may arise from or has experience using Modular Fuel Tanks with Interstellar Fuel Switch (or just KSPIE in general)? Also Tweakscale? I haven't noticed anything but I'm using a wide array of stock-ish tanks and I'm more used to Real Fuels/Procedural Parts-style tank management. I have yet to really change any tank contents because I don't need to. I much prefer MFT but IFS is required by mods I use.

Thanks.
